sentences.en: a man who was to all intents and purposes illiterate.
sentences.cn: 几乎一无所知的人。

sentences.en: A merchant is intent on making money.
sentences.cn: 商人热衷于赚钱.

sentences.en: Amy watched the child's intent face eagerly, trying to fix it in her mind.
sentences.cn: 埃米急切地看着孩子那张神情专注的脸，想把它记在脑海里。

sentences.en: an intent gaze/look
sentences.cn: 专注的目光 / 神情

sentences.en: But everybody was talking, and intent upon the grisly spectacle before them.
sentences.cn: 可是大家都在谈话, 一心关注的是眼前的这个惨状.

sentences.en: charges of wounding with intent.
sentences.cn: 对故意伤害的指控。

sentences.en: he denied arson with intent to endanger life.
sentences.cn: 他否认纵火有杀人企图。

sentences.en: He was intent on murder and he came within an ace of succeeding.
sentences.cn: 他一心想杀人并且差点就得逞了。

sentences.en: He was intent on the job he was doing.
sentences.cn: 他专心致志于正在做的工作.

sentences.en: He's intent upon revenge.
sentences.cn: 他一心想报仇.

sentences.en: His eyes were suddenly intent.
sentences.cn: 他的目光突然专注起来。

sentences.en: his intent gaze
sentences.cn: 他专注的凝视

sentences.en: I'm afraid it was not the original intent.
sentences.cn: 恐非原意.

sentences.en: She behaved foolishly but with good intent.
sentences.cn: 她表现得很愚蠢,不过用心却是好的.

sentences.en: The editor compiles this book with the intent of helping Chinese students of English overcome many difficulties which they may come across in reading.
sentences.cn: 编者编纂这本书的目的在于帮助学英语的中国学生解决阅读时可能遇到的许多困难.

sentences.en: The play starred a well-known retired actress who was intent on a come-back.
sentences.cn: 该剧由一名志在复出的著名隐退女演员主演。

sentences.en: There was an intent look on her face as she watched the game.
sentences.cn: 她看比赛时脸上显示出专注的神色.

sentences.en: There's usually a lot of attribution of evil intent to those who have different views.
sentences.cn: 那些持异议者通常多被认为心怀邪念。

sentences.en: They took to the water intent on netting the £250,000 reward offered for conclusive proof of the monster's existence.
sentences.cn: 他们前往那片水域，打算找到怪物存在的确凿证据，以获得为此设立的25万英镑奖金。

sentences.en: To all intents and purposes the case is closed.
sentences.cn: 实际上这个案子已了结了

sentences.en: Two men will appear before Birmingham magistrates' court today charged with possession of arms with intent to endanger life.
sentences.cn: 两名男子今天将在伯明翰地方法庭受审，他们被控持有武器，企图危害他人生命。

sentences.en: What is the intent of that sentence?
sentences.cn: 那句话的意思是什么?

words.tran_cn: 专心地；一心一意地；心无旁物地

phrases.phrase: for all intents and purposes 或 to all intents and purposes
phrases.tran_cn: 几乎在一切方面；实际上
专心致志于；抱定决心要实行
n. 意向书；合同之草约

trans.tran_cn: 专心的，专注的，意愿坚决的，急切的，一心想…的
